text: Ben Gibbard (born August 11, 1976) is an American musician. He is the lead singer of the indie bands Death Cab for Cutie and The Postal Service. He is also a solo artist. He was married to actress and musician Zooey Deschanel from 2009 to 2012. ==Other websites== *Death Cab for Cutie's official website *20 Questions with Ben Gibbard from 2000 Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Washington (state) Category:People from Bremerton, Washington Category:Musicians from Washington Category:American rock singers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock drummers Category:American bass guitarists Category:American pianists
title: Ben Gibbard
